meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching vodcasts of cute animals on the internet.
meanings.sent2: She subscribed to several vodcasts to stay updated on the latest news.
meanings.sent3: The vodcast about cooking made me hungry for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The vodcast on travel takes me on virtual adventures around the world.
meanings.sent5: The vodcast on gardening taught me how to care for my plants better.

meanings.definition: To create or watch a vodcast.
meanings.sent1: He vodcasts about his daily life and shares it with his followers.
meanings.sent2: They vodcasted the concert for those who couldn't attend in person.
meanings.sent3: She vodcasts her dance routines to showcase her talent.
meanings.sent4: Vodcasting their family gatherings helps them preserve precious memories.
meanings.sent5: The teacher vodcasts lessons for students who miss class.
